title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram - Ruby & Emerald Peacock Pendant Necklace
materials: Faceted Emerald (Pear & Round Cut). Meticulously handcrafted with Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: This exquisite short Haaram features a delicate chain design adorned with CZ stones, leading to a stunning pendant. The pendant showcases a traditional South Indian peacock (Mayura) design, embellished with a vibrant ruby at the center and emeralds accentuating the peacock's form. The design incorporates intricate filigree work and delicate gold bead hangings (gundla) for added charm.
colors: antique finish. Features vibrant pops of red (ruby) and green (emerald)
creating a striking contrast. The CZ stones add a dazzling white sparkle.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. An ideal choice for brides or anyone looking to add a touch of traditional elegance to their attire. Suitable for Seemantham ceremonies or as a memorable gift.
description: This Lakshmi Kasula Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry design. The intricate peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and good fortune. The use of high-quality CZ stones provides a brilliant sparkle at an accessible price point, while the ruby and emerald accents add a touch of royalty. Its short length makes it a versatile piece that can be paired with both traditional and modern outfits.
